name: Time Control Inc
description:
My entry for this months Godot Wild Jam!

Description:

Scientists from the future have lost ancient technology into the past and you've been hired to search through space to find it! 

How To Play:

Get the lost technology to raise your score, try to get the highest score possible!

When you turn, time speeds up!

When you turn in both directions at the same time, time speeds up!

Controls:

Mobile: Tap/Hold on the left and right sides of the screen

PC: <-  Left & Right Arrow Keys ->

Credits & Notes:

Font - By Kenney: Kenney • Kenney Fonts (Kenney Mini Square)
